properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued February 7 at 3:48AM EST until February 7 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 50 kt with gusts up to 60 kt and
seas 10 to 15 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen
Bank National Marine Sanctuary.

* WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
